runs.comm: full in length on the pads, rolls away to short fine-leg fielder
banged in short, Warner ducks and it has been called a wide. Afridi is surprised with that call.

Warner is gone for a duck. They are dancing in the aisles. It was the full length delivery going away from Warner who cuts it straight to backward point. That boy Umar again! What a start for Pakistan. What a tame dismissal. A very soft shot.
short in length on the middle, tucked past square-leg
crunchy yorker on the off stump, squeezed out to the off side
Watson breaks free. It was a slightly short delivery and Watson pulls it past midwicket
outside off stump, run down to third man for a single
hmm another over with an extra ball .... pushed out to covers. .
Watto you beauty! It was a slightly short of length delivery and Watson pulls it over midwicket boundary
length delivery on the off stump line, punched back to the bowler
short in length on the middle stump line, punched down to long-on
Shot! Superbly done. He backed away slightly even as he took a step down the track, stayed adjacent to the line, held his balance well and punched the short-of-length delivery through covers
full pitched on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Thump! Quite similar delivery to the previous one. That was pushed back to the bowler. This has been smashed through the line between the bowler and mid-off.
It almost decapitates Haddin! What a wallop. It was a length delivery and Watson pressed forward and muscled it past Haddin!
fuller, Watson digs it out to the off side .. He made contact with the bottom of the bat

What a moment this. The openers are back in the hutch. Pressure. Watson has hit a full delivery straight to long-on! The Pakistan dug-out is celebrating. The fans are screaming in joy. Enter Pup. The Australian captain is in the middle. What can he do now?
full in length outside off stump, pushed out to backward point
works this wide of third man for a single
fullish on the off stump line, dragged of the inner edge past square-leg
full in length around the off stump line, haddin tries to clear mid-on and ends up dragging it wider ... two runs
short in length outside off stump, punched to covers
slower one around the off stump line, pushed out to the off side
full in length, sliced away to point region
It was a length delivery on the off stump line, he pushes it back to the bowler
What a shot! Clarke walked down the track, backed away slightly and punched it sweetly on the up and well to the left of mid-off
on the middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
quicker, on the middle and off, tapped to midwicket .. empty spaces there .. by the time the man runs in from the deep .. they take two
Superbly done. It was drifting towards his pads and he swung it neatly and nonchalantly over backward square-leg boundary
slows up the pace, shifts the line to the off stump, Haddin pushes it to point
on the middle stump line, turned towards deep midwicket for a single
on the middle, stops a touch on Haddin who checks his shot and stabs it uppishly down the track
drops it short, slightly short in length mind you and Clarke plays a superb cut shot to the boundary
drifts down the leg .. rolls of the pad to fine-leg
Lovely doosra! Clarke is comprehensively beaten. He goes back and stabs well inside the line.
leans forward to defend to the on side
goes right back to tap it to midwicket
quicker, on the middle, worked to midwicket for a single
just around the off stump line, tapped to short third man
quickish slider, goes for the pull but ends up edging it to the off side
moves down the track and turns this one through midwicket
quick delivery on the off stump line, pushed out to sweeper cover
leans forward to on drive to push it wide of long-on for couple of runs
slightly short in length, cut to point
backs away to cut to covers

Stumped! Haddin went dancing down the track but the ball curved past him. It dipped rapidly on the advancing Haddin, gripped the surface and broke away to Kamran who does the rest. Third wicket down and Australia are wobbling here in St Lucia.
on the off stump line, pushed out to point
leans forward to on drive to right of long-on for couple of runs
goes down the track, the bowler drags back the length.. pushed out to coverse
quickish, goes back to punch it to the on side for a single

loud shout for lbw Looked close. Hawk eyes says it would have hit the bails. It was the quick slider that came in from the off stump line. the batsman pushed outside the line and it hit him on the pad in front of middle.

The Pakistan captain knocks out his counterpart. Stumped! What a strike. Clarke went down the track for the big hit but met thin air: Afridi hurled it quicker, dragged back the length, kept it flatter and Clarke tried to swipe it across the line but missed. Very good work from Kamran. The bails were off in a flash.
drifts in on the middle stump line, defends to the off side
gets forward to defend the slider
works this one through midwicket for a single
flighted around off stump line, eased through mid-off
presses back to punch this one past the non striker
stays back to punch it to Umar at long-off
gets forward to ping long-on for a single
moves outside leg stump... and tries to slog it away .. and edges it to the on side
again moves to the on side, the bowler follows him, he tries to swing to the on side but misses and is hit on the pad
around the off stump line, pushed out to covers
quicker one, on the off stump line, pushed back to Afridi
Bang! White has gone down on his knees and swung this full delivery from outside off to the midwicket boundary
Violent thump! White is turning it on here. Again he went down on his knee, again he went for the slog sweep to a delivery outside off,and again he connected superbly
leans forward to drive to long-off
outside off stump, square driven to deep-point region
turns in to the middle and off line, the batsman goes back to punch it past the non striker

White has come as a fresh breath of air here for Australia. A cry of joy. He moves outside leg, reaches out to the full delivery outside off and crashes it on a bent knee. It flew high over the cover boundary
reaches forward to ping long-off
rotates the strike with a dab to midwicket
moves outside leg, the ball is on the middle and leg line, wristed through midwicket
Whack! Hussey takes the White route. He moves outside leg and thumps a full delivery over long-off

More fun. More drama. This chase has suddenly come aliev. He shuffles to the off side and goes for the big swing to the square-leg boundary. He gets an top edge but it sails over backward square-leg boundary.
around the off stump line, squeezed out to point for a single

Another twist. Another wicket. Pakistan keep the heat on. This one was flighted on the leg and middle and Hussey thought .. I will push it to midwicket and get a single and give the strike to White. Mistake. The ball was slower in pace, it grips and straightens and perhaps stops a touch on Hussey who gets a leading edge back to the bowler. Gone! Michael Hussey walks in.
turns in from outside off, dabbed down the track
pushes this one to point for a single
quicker outside off, dabbed to short third man
moves outside leg and punches it to cover

Oh byes! White moved to the off side and goes for an almighty swing to the on side.. The ball had landed on middle and leg and turned down the leg stump. But Kamran hadn't moved to his left. Perhaps he was unsighted by White.
quicker one and it bounces as well .. A surprised White tries to punch it and misses/. Kamran collects it this time. Good take.
White moves to the off side and has another go with that on side swing shot but again makes no contact .. Kamran gets his body behind the ball this time
outside off stump, sliced to short third man where the ball spins away from the Aamer

Shout for stumping Superb work from Kamran! It broke away from White who slid forward for the big hit. The back leg was lifted in the air and Kamran quickly, very quickly, breaks the stumps but White had just about got his back foot back to earth
lovely skidding delivery and White stabs it away
goes for the forcing shot to the on side but makes no contact. Kamran collects.
stays back to clip this to short fine-leg region ..
outside off stump, turns away, White goes for the slog sweep but no wood on leather
All mighty wallop! Whadddaplayaaaaa! He pressed forward and thumped the length delivery over midwicket. Violent swing of the bat and the white ball disappears
shout for lbw but that was missing leg stump. White tries to whip it to the on side but misses
No ball as the ball slipped out as a very high full toss .almost at the face . A surprised White manages to get some bat on the bal as he goes for the pull ..
goes back to turn it to the on side for a single
outside off stump, chopped away square of the wicket
moves outside leg stump and cuts hard to left of sweeper cover
slows up the pace, Hussey is through with the pull shot and is hit on the body
Thump! Afridi drops it short and on the leg stump line and Michael pulls it to perfection!
The drama continues here at St Lucia. Immense fun. Another short delivery from Afridi which is a surprise. Another fab pull shot from Hussey which is not a surprise. The game remains alive.
slider on the leg stump line, rolls off the pad to the on side
really full delivery on the middle, squeezed out to point
pressure. Pushes this one down the leg side for a wide.
goes for the yorker, ends up as a low full toss on middle and leg, flicked away but there is a man in the deep. Just a single.

Is this the moment of the chase? And would you believe it, it was a full toss that did the trick for Pakistan. A full toss on the off stump line. White's eyes opens up and he tries to smash it through the line to long-off. Perhaps that was the mistake. He couldn't find enough power behind it and couldn't clear long-off. But what an innings this has been from White. Great to watch. Superb under pressure. But he is gone now.
slips it on the pads, it was the slow off cutter, and Smith stays back to play the leg glance to perfection
full and angling away from Smith who goes for the swing to the on side but makes no contact

leans across to scoop the full delivery over square-leg. Kamran screams the fielder to release the ball to him. The batsmen think about the second but the fielder has released the ball quickly. Just a single. Kamran is happy.

Ajmal can be such a difficult bowler to get away in these circumstances. Those tantalizing doosras. It landed on the middle stump line, Smith was down the track and actually tried to loft it over the off-side which perhaps indicates that he thought it might be the doosra. But no wood on leather. The ball goes past the flashing blade and to Kamran Akmal who very calmly takes off the bails. Ajmal celebrates. What a lovely delivery
he slows up the pace .. flights it outside off, Mitch waits on the front foot and crashes it really hard to the midwicket boundary
on the middle and leg line, rolls away to the leg side
Ajmal drifts to the leg side and Hussey jumps at the opportunity. He was well inside the crease and swings it over backward square-leg boundary
really full delivery, squeezed out to the empty spaces in midwicket. They run really hard. And will collect two runs.
full delivery, Hussey tries to heave it to the on side but doesn't connect. A leg bye will give him the strike though
Four of the first ball. Hussey leans across, waits for the fulll ball to arrive and paddles it to the fine-leg boundary. Icy cool.

full pitched outside off, driven to Umar at long-off .. they turn for the second run. Umar fires the throw to Aamer who breaks the stumps. The call is referred upstairs. Mitch dives to get back in the crease in time.
tries to repeat the paddle shot that he attempted the first ball .. this time he doesn't connect properly.. the ball rolls away to third man ..
Kamran is screaming away out there..he wants the throw ...this one was heaved away towards long-on .. and they will take the second run. Pretty comfortable run actually.
backs away even as he gets down the track and drives to right of Umar at long-off. Two more.

Very important delivery in the context of the game and Hussey keeps Australia alive with a four. It was the low dipping full toss, attempted yorker, .. Hussey had moved down the track, collected it on the full and dragged it to left of deep midwicket .. Mis bah rushes and throws in a dive but ends up dragging the ball with him over the boundary/.
almost yorker length as he follows Mitch who was moving away outside leg stump .. edged to short fine-leg region.
What a thunderous wallop. Tonked! Ajmal drops it short and Hussey waits before he plays a crunching pull shot. IT's a six!
OMG! It's a six! Fabulicious!  Stunning! What a strike. What drama! This time he went down on his knee to swing it over long-on for a glorious six!

Absolutely crunched! And the scores are level! Unbelievable scenes here. Michael Hussey you beauty! What immense drama here. It was a length delivery outside off stump, Huseey slashed out at it and edges it past backward point fielder . IT went over the leaping fielder. It was that close. It was that dramatic.

Australianism prevails! What a great dramatic game this has been. Goose bumps! What a heartbreak for Pakistan. Michael Hussey has played like a dream. Whaddaplaayaaaa! He finished the game with yet another big hit. This is the Twenty20 innings of his lifetime. And what a way to finish it in style. He cleared the front foot and swung the ball over long-on. The while ball disappeared beyond the boundary. The Australian dug out erupted in joy. The Pakistani camp is stunned. U N B E L I E V A B L E. Hussey is mobbed by his team-mates. Clarke envelops him with a hug. The entire squad is out there on the ground. Take a bow Michael Hussey. Respect.
